project.name: RudeTools Releng: Now Shell Feature
project.description: The Now tools is a simple and easy tool of an Eclipse plugin. It could be used in Eclipse with handy functions. It has the following functions: 1. Open Terminal - Press [Ctrl + T] to open a terminal window in current position. 2. Open Folder - Press [Ctrl + D] to open the file explorer in current position. 3. Copy Path - Copy current full path with [Ctrl + Shift + C] for current selection. 4. Windows, Linux / gtk, Mac OS X are supported. Any question, issue, and enhancement is welcome.
